title: Ticket #2002: Default libvirt script issue
description:
Hi,

In 7.5.6, the default libvirt_simple_script.awk has broken due to a small parsing error. See below.

I can't tell if libvirt_simple_script.awk is turned on by default in the 7.5.6 default CONDOR_CONFIG. It was on the one I was using (from 7.5.4). If it is turned on, VM networking is broken. Judging from the code, in this case, one should be able to comment out LIBVIRT_XML_SCRIPT and get an equivalent behavior.

Hope this helps someone out there.

Brian 

--- a/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk
+++ b/src/condor_vm-gahp/libvirt_simple_script.awk
@@ -97,7 +97,7 @@ END {

     print "<devices>" ;
     print "<console type='pty'><source path='/dev/ptmx'/></console>" ;
-    if(attrs["JobVMNetworking"] == "TRUE")
+    if(attrs["JobVMNetworking"] == "true")
     {
        if(index(attrs["JobVMNetworkingType"],"nat") != 0)
        {
